name: Getfloorplan
tagline: AI-generated 2D and 3D floor plans from sketches or photos
description: Getfloorplan uses AI to transform rough sketches, blueprints, or even photos into professional 2D floor plans, 3D floor plans, and virtual tours. Real estate agents can submit a hand-drawn sketch and receive polished, MLS-ready floor plans within hours. The service combines AI automation with human quality control for accurate, attractive results.
